phrs.translation: n. 黑皮诺/黑比诺（葡萄品种之一）

sentences.sentence: Increasingly, more winemakers are taking up the challenge of growing Pinot Noir.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的葡萄酒商开始接受种植“黑比诺”葡萄的挑战。

sentences.sentence: He sat next to her at the bar and ordered a glass of Pinot Noir.
sentences.translation: 他坐在她旁边，点了一杯黑比诺酒。
